name: Thanos
description: The Most Powerful Being in the Universe

name: Captain Marvel
description: One of the universe's most powerful heroes

name: Loki
description: Prince of Asgard, Odinson, the rightful King of Jotunheim, God of Mischief

name: Thor
description: The blood-son of Odin, All-Father of the Asgardians

name: Juggernaut
description: Step-brother of X-Men founder Charles Xavier and the avatar of Cyttorak

name: Iron-Man
description: Tony Stark, a wealthy American business magnate, playboy, and ingenious scientist

name: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, king and protector of Wakanda
